MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH21 postcode of Musselburgh, affecting properties in Whitecraig Crescent and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.37pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.28pm on the 27th January 2021.
